name: Palm Island 2048
description:
Run your last resort, by combining everything that you own to make income. Posh people like to be treated like a kings and queens.

How to play:

  • Purchase items to fulfill your customer's needs.
  • Combine similar items to get better things. Better things makes customers happier and they will spend more money while using it.
  • Don't break your bank - bankruptcy punishable by game over :)

Movement WASD (or equivalent)

LMB(Fire1) - Drag, RMB(Fire2) Use/Menu

Part of #PlaymakerGameJam2018

Added Post-jam version, with just some minor bug fixes, like a rating system more realistic, sleep cycle are shorter, 'how to play', havigation around fridges fixed and people scale.

Important Source fix.  I had to update source files, as it contain really nasty bug. I uploaded it as version 2. Original, buggy version is still available.
